name: @isaytoo/widget-cross-table
description: Cross-Table Explorer: Join multiple Grist tables by a common key, filter and cross-reference data, then generate a result table.

grist.name: Cross-Table Explorer
grist.description: Join multiple tables by a common key (INNER/LEFT), select columns, apply filters, deduplicate, and generate a result table in Grist. Bilingual FR/EN.
